chapter.title: Registering &slsa;
chapter.para: To get technical support and product updates, you need to register and activate your &suse; product with the &scc;. It is recommended to register during the installation, since this will enable you to install the system with the latest updates and patches available. However, if you are offline or want to skip the registration step, you can register at any time later from the installed system.

note.para: In case your organization does not provide a local registration server, registering &slsa; requires a &suse; account. In case you do not have a &suse; account yet, go to the &scc; home page (https://scc.suse.com/) to create one.
